articles.description: Fans cringe at 13-year free kick record in Lions vs. Cats game
articles.content: AFL fans have unleashed on the umpires of Thursday nights game between the Cats and Lions, after a whopping 37 free kicks were blown before the main break.Not since round 15 of 2008 — in another Geel… [+2067 chars]

articles.content: NSW have done very well since their 50-6 win over Queensland to say as little as possible, but that may just have changed thanks to Blues coach Brad Fittler.Since the thrashing in Townsville, Queensl… [+2989 chars]
